Over the past 24 hours, the Russian Federation has used 234 FPV-drones in Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhya and Kherson regions, increasing their number by almost 40%.

About thisreportThe forces of the South Defense.

"Continuing the terror of the civilian population of the frontline regions of Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhya and Kherson regions, the enemy applied 234 FPV-punks, increasing their number by almost 40%, compared to last day," the statement said.

At the same time, during the day, the enemy struck with winged and ballistic missiles in the Nikolaev area, a trash was recorded in the open territory outside the settlements. People were not injured.

In addition, the enemy used 13 Lancet UAVs and dropped 269 fragmental ammunition from the drones of different modifications.

“There is a steady trend towards at least 15% of a day. But our IE is working well against them, ”the military said.

AsreportedThe armyinform, last day from mortars, tanks and artillery, Rosarmia attacked 12 regions of Ukraine.
